title: Can't log into client
body: I just updated into the new beta client and it won't let me log in. I type in my username and password and try to click sign in, but it just flashes when I click it. I really want to play since I'm a new LoL player, but can't. Please help me!

replies.body:
It's strange to hear about this flash, and suggest reporting it with a screenshot over at the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  In the meantime, see if you can get back in through the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
